subject: Pain
Biotechnology
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Athletes like Kobe Bryant and Andrew Bynum, seeking to dull chronic pain, have increasingly found their way to a German orthopedist who tries to heal aging joints by manipulating patients’ blood.
snippet: Athletes like Kobe Bryant and Andrew Bynum, seeking to dull chronic pain, have increasingly found their way to a German orthopedist who tries to heal aging joints by manipulating patients’ blood.
